Headline: Must-watch videos of the week
Article_Body: A black bear in a tub, a rare look at the Obama family, a light moment between the Cuomo brothers. These are the videos you don't want to miss this week. Meet Takoda A black bear in a tub is the video you didn't know you needed. Brotherly love CNN anchor Chris Cuomo has a lighter moment with his brother, New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo, when they joke about the elder Cuomo's heightened profile during the coronavirus pandemic. Up close and personal Michelle Obama's new Netflix documentary, "Becoming," gives a rare look at the former first lady's family and inner circle. A game or a survival skill? Researchers in the UK spent more than six months attempting to learn why otters "juggle." Is it just play, or is it a survival skill? His biggest cheerleader A 4-year-old in Georgia hit his first-ever home run and his dad's reaction will bring a smile to your face.
